Reviews.Title: Bad quality
Reviews.Author: mamacuty
Reviews.Content: The instruction for this little gadget is lack of direction and it doesn't work after a full charge, the yellow light keep blinking and never turn to green. I finally give up and return back to the seller.

Reviews.Title: recorder
Reviews.Author: pic happy
Reviews.Content: did not work, Great Idea, but it could not preform what was promised.wish it did work, it would have come in handy..

Reviews.Title: Good product for the quility
Reviews.Author: Gary Bush
Reviews.Content: The product came in a nice box with a magnetic lid.The instructions are in Chinese’s and English but small print, everything but the SD card was in the box as was described in summary, Nice metal case with white plastic dial, MP3 player works a little slow but has good Sound, the Video and audio are a good quality and the pictures are better. Does work in low light , the one I got the SD card slot was not made right and the card would fall out or slide all the way into the unit.

ProductInfo.Name: Mini Gadgets HC-MP3 Hidden Camera MP3 Player
